title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: The functionality to open/close a project in the navigator is sometimes not available. Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The option to open/close a project is not always available in the navigator.
EB: Either both options should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
1. Launch the navigator.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Verify if the option to open/close a project is available.
4. Repeat the above steps with different projects to confirm the behavior.
